trends: There have been no other sightings in Bolivia
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: During a sheet lightning display I was staring at the western sky when I clearly saw a cigar shaped object moving at a speed over 500 mph. It path was straight for a short time and then abruptly turned east. I continued to watch but it vanished.
divs: sighting detailsi was on my back patio watching sheet lightning in the western sky. as i was looking up i clearly saw a solid cigar shaped, illuminated object traveling somewhat faster than a commercial aircraft. it was so clear that i immediately saw that it lacked any fixed wing , rotor, tail or navigation lights. this object was even more clear each time lightning struck, though it was very clear even without it. i watched it travel along a straight course for about 1- 1 1\2 minutes at which time it abruptly turned on a dime to the east. i waited for it to pass some sparse pine tree limbs. i watched for at least 6 or 7 more minutes but the object vanished. this was no anomaly. it was exceptionally easy to see. i have watched the skies for the better part of my adult life (i'm 62)and have had more than just a passing interest in ufo's. i have never seen one before this. i knew immediately that it was a ufo.
